entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
